p: The chemicals, media, and solvents used in this study were anhydrous sodium sulfate, cetostearyl alcohol, hard paraffin, liquid paraffin, propylene glycol, stearyl alcohol, and wool fat and were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Germany). Polyethylene glycol (PEG) 4000 and PEG 600 were obtained from BDH (England). Sodium lauryl sulfate was purchased from LABORT Fine Chemicals (India) and white petrolatum USP was purchased from EPHARM (Ethiopia). Muller-Hinton agar, Muller-Hinton broth, nutrient agar, nutrient broth, Sabouraud dextrose agar, Sabouraud dextrose broth, tryptone soya, agar and tryptone soya broth were purchased from Oxoid (UK). Yeast extract was purchased from LABORT (India).
